ðŸ“– Summary: CDImage is a C++ tool that allows users to burn visible pictures onto the surface of a compact disc. It provides a GUI with a visual preview mode and utilizes coordinate conversion code based on previous implementations. The project has been ported to Qt6 and offers a Windows binary build for ease of use.
